thread.title: SC allows dance bars to operate in M'rashtra
thread.title_full: SC allows dance bars to operate in M'rashtra

author: tribuneindia.com
title: SC allows dance bars to operate in M'rashtra
text:
Tribune News Service
New Delhi, October 15
The Supreme Court on Thursday said Maharashtra cannot prohibit dance performances at restaurants or other places where liquor is served. The Supreme Court stayed the relevant law that allows the state to prohibit such acts. The state, however, is free to regulate such performances to prevent obscenity offending women's sensibility and dignity. The state had enacted the law after the Bombay High Court and Supreme Court had struck down an earlier law.
